column2: "The Fighter class used to be one of the ARKS combat classes, a while back."
"Now that ARKS is growing, it's a class that's being reintroduced. More people means more specialization."

"Fighters are more agile and aggressive than Hunters, but their weaker defenses put them at higher risk. Anyhow, show me what you've got by finishing that task I gave you. If you do good, I'll recommend you as a Fighter!"
